posts.message: Heartbleed bug is a serious bug in OpenSSL that affects many web services/servers/apps ..
posts.caption: heartbleed.com
posts.description: The Heartbleed Bug is a serious vulnerability in the popular OpenSSL cryptographic software library. This weakness allows stealing the information protected, under normal conditions, by the SSL/TLS encryption used to secure the Internet. SSL/TLS provides communication security and privacy over the I...
